dataLink.name: Ozone and stratospheric water vapour concentration databases for CMIP6

availability.description: Ozone and Stratospheric Water Vapour Data
availability.name: Ozone and stratospheric water vapour concentration databases for CMIP6

description: Impose present day (2014) stratospheric ozone as a substitute for solar particle forcing.  To be used by CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry, they should instead prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
name: Present day 2014 stratospheric Ozone as a substitute for solar particle forcing
rationale: For models that lack interactive chemistry.
longName: Present day (2014) stratospheric Ozone concentrations as a substitue for solar particle forcing for models without interactive chemsitry
keywords: present day, 2014, Stratospheric Ozone, O3, concentrations
